From BYO:
Spread the flaked oats out on a cookie sheet and toast them in the oven around 149 °C until they begin to slightly color up and give off a nutty oatmeal cookie character. 
Mill all of the grains together and add @ temperature of 68 °C
Hold the mash at 68 °C until enzymatic conversion is complete. 
Infuse the mash with near-boiling water while stirring or with a recirculating mash system raise the temperature to mash out at 76 °C
Sparge slowly with 77 °C water
Gravity - 11.5 °P
